system.novice: Navigator projects a 10 metre, 30 degree cone. All living creatures in range make +0 Agility Test or take 1d10+4 Energy Damage with Pen 2. Navigator makes +20 Toughness Test or suffers one fatigue.
system.adept: Acts as a Flamer (20m; 1d10+4 E; Pen 2; Flame, Spray), does +2 Damage per 10 Corruption target has. Doesn't cause fatigue on use.
system.master: Acts as Heavy Flamer (30m; 1d10+5; Pen 4; Flame, Spray), does +4 damage per 10 corruption  target has

description.value:
Novice: Navigator projects a 10 metre, 30 degree cone. All living creatures in range make +0 Agility Test or take 1d10+4 Energy Damage with Pen 2. Navigator makes +20 Toughness Test or suffers one fatigue.

Adept: Acts as a Flamer (20m; 1d10+4 E; Pen 2; Flame, Spray), does +2 Damage per 10 Corruption target has. Doesn't cause fatigue on use.

Master: Acts as Heavy Flamer (30m; 1d10+5; Pen 4; Flame, Spray), does +4 damage per 10 corruption target has
